tailored_cv_content.summary: Highly proficient Python Developer with 3+ years of experience in developing and maintaining web applications using Python and Django. Proven ability to implement RESTful APIs, integrate with third-party services, and write comprehensive unit and integration tests. Seeking a challenging Python Developer role to leverage expertise in web development and contribute to innovative projects.

Learned and applied new technologies.
